history.content:
Resumewabi is hiring backend & frontend engineers!
Hi, I'm Namrata, a 2nd-year master's student, and I started resumewabi.com 5 months ago. We use machine learning to provide users with recommendations that improve their resumes and increase the likelihood of landing interviews. We've done significant customer research to validate the idea, built an MVP and are launching our beta in the next few weeks. We've just started applying to accelerators and are going to begin fundraising soon after the beta launch. I'm planning on working on this full time after graduation. 
Hiring: We're hiring engineering interns (2 backend, 1 front end), who can join our team and work with us through Fall (and potentially beyond that). We understand you may already have school commitments and are happy to discuss flexible part-time options.
Current Team: We have a tech team of 2 backend and 1 frontend engineers, all of whom are current students at Cal and UC Riverside. We also have team members working on marketing and product. Our advisors include Kaushik Gopal, co-founder of the Android podcast Fragmented (who is also a Senior Staff Engineer at Instacart) and Karthick Gopal, an ex-Apple Design Evangelist, and current VP of Product and Design at Deskera. 
If you'd like to work with us (or just talk about the options), email me at namrata_mani@berkeley.edu.
history.subject: Fall Internship Opportunity!
